description.para: The httptrap module provides a simple way to push data into reconnoiter from other applications. Simply structure a json document and use the PUT method against reconnoiter's psuedo-webserver on port 43191.

moduleconfig.parameter: Specify whether httptrap metrics are logged immediately or help until the status message is to be emitted.

checkconfig.parameter: Specify whether httptrap metrics are logged immediately or help until the status message is to be emitted.
Specify the secret with which metrics may be submitted.

example.title: Posting a string and a number.
example.programlisting: <noit> <modules> <module image="httptrap" name="httptrap"/> </modules> <checks> <check uuid="1b4e28ba-2fa1-11d2-893f-e9b761bde3fb" module="httptrap" target="127.0.0.1" period="60000" timeout="30000"> <config><secret>s3cr3tk3y</secret></config> </check> </checks> </noit>
